apm-config
**********


Description
===========

An CLI for the APM Configuration service. Use this CLI to query and
set APM configuration.


Available Commands
==================

* config

  * create-apdex-rules

  * create-metric-group

  * create-span-filter

  * delete

  * get

  * update-apdex-rules

  * update-metric-group

  * update-span-filter

* config-collection

  * list
